Business_Process_Parameters.description: When set to "true" or "1", the business process is automatically processed. This means that all approvals will be automatically approved in the system, all reviews and to-do's will be automatically by-passed, and all notifications will be automatically suppressed.

Indicates the transaction should process to completion before the response is generated.  Note: All < v12 operations will process with Run_Now = True for backwards compatibility but please review this setting in your environment for performance conditions.

Enforces all validation conditions defined on the initiation step.  If any condition is true, the validation error blocks the step from exiting and a business process event isn't created. The attribute is currently not available for use. It will be generally available for all web services in a future release.

Business_Process_Comment_Data.description: Free form comment regarding the business process.

validation.validation: This Business Process has been configured to disable comment. Please remove the comment or change the setting in the Business Process Policy or tenant setup.

WorkerObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

WorkerObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

WorkerObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Container for the processing options for a business process. If no options are submitted (or the options are submitted as 'false') then the business process is simply initiated as if it where submitted on-line with approvals, reviews, notifications and to-do's in place. If the Initiator is an Integration System User, any validations you configured on the Initiation step are ignored.

Job_History.description: Reference to the Job History profile.

Job_History_Achievement_Data.description: External Employment ID. If no value is provided, a new external employment will be created. If a value is passed in an a corresponding external employment is not found, a new external employment will be created with the provided id.
Used for inbound operations to indicate that the Job History should be removed for the person.  Will always return false for outbound operations.

validation.validation: Remove Job History is true without a Job History or valid External Employment ID.  A Job History or valid External Employment ID must be specified in order to remove the Job History.

Job_History_Achievement_Data.description: The Business Title for the job.  Required unless the Job History is being removed.

validation.validation: Job Title must be specified unless the Job History is being removed.

Job_History_Achievement_Data.description: The name of the company.  Either this field or Job History Company Reference is required unless the Job History is being removed.

Job_History_Achievement_Data.description: A reference to an existing Job History Company.  Either this field or Company is required unless the Job History is being removed.
The start date of employment.  Required unless the Job History is being removed.

validation.validation: Start Date must be specified unless the Job History is being removed.

Job_History_Achievement_Data.description: Description of responsibilities and achievements during the tenure of the job.
References from colleagues, subordinates,managers, associates during the job tenure.

Job_History.description: Wrapper element for Job History Data.

validation.validation: There is an in progress event for this worker for the Job History: [job].  Only one in progress event is allowed.
validation.description: Only one change can be in progress (the event in progress and not complete or canceled) for a job history for a particular worker.

validation.validation: Either the Company or a Job History Company Reference must be specified, unless the Job History is being removed.

Manage_Worker_Job_History_Data.description: Wrapper element for Job History information.

validation.validation: That Skill is already in use by another person. Select another one or leave it blank.
